subtests.name: Can be set to each of the possible keywords
Can be changed from 'normal' to 'reverse' while in progress
Can be changed from 'normal' to 'reverse' while at start of active interval
Can be changed from 'normal' to 'reverse' while filling backwards
Can be changed from 'normal' to 'alternate' while in progress
Can be changed from 'alternate' to 'alternate-reverse' while in progress
